Title: Zefira - Amena Area Rug
Body (HTML):
An intricate, traditional design with subtle distressing grants our Vibe by Jaipur Living Zefira Amena rug timeless appeal. Of course, its polypropylene construction is as modern as it gets, providing a soft feel along with durability and ease of care.

  • Simple to maintain and incredibly durable, our polypropylene Zefira collection is ideally suited for high-traffic settings.
  • A perfect backdrop for your dining room, guest bedroom, or entryway, this traditional beauty boasts Persian-inspired details and slight distressing for a heirloom-like look.
  • These synthetic indoor rugs are power-loomed into a high pile height for a mix of comfort and strength.
  • Remove spills or stains on rug yarns by using a sponge, cold water, and mild detergent.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Kairos - Mirta Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Subtle distressing lends even sophistication to the classic medallion motifs on our Jaipur Living Kairos Mirta rug. Of course, its polyester construction and playful palette grant this floor covering practicality and a touch of fun.

  • The design is printed directly onto the flat polyester surface. No pile ensures durability in a kid- and pet-friendly household.
  • Because of its synthetic makeup, the family-friendly Kairos collection is extremely easy to maintain and naturally resistant to stains.
  • A mix of traditional and Moroccan elements lend timeless charm to this playful, pink-and-blue hued floor covering, no matter if it's placed in your entryway or master suite.
  • Our polyester indoor rug is incredibly comfortable and durable thanks to its low pile of power-loomed yarns.
  • Vacuuming your rug regularly is the easiest way to maintain healthy fibers and prolong its life.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Cardamom - Idina Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Showcasing distressed motifs and warm hues, the Vibe by Jaipur Living Cardamom Idina area rug bestows vintage charm and beauty to your home. Even better, it's hand-tufted of pure wool, resulting in supreme comfort underfoot.

  • Our Cardamom collection is a true work of art as each rug is painstakingly hand-tufted of 100% wool.
  • Warm, sun-faded tones and a vintage-inspired Turkish design lend timeless appeal to our traditional floor covering, which is the ideal backdrop for living rooms, master suites, and home offices.
  • A high pile of wool yarns is masterfully hand-tufted by artisans to create our soft indoor area rug.
  • Prolong the life of your rug by thoroughly vacuuming it to remove dirt and debris.

Title: Lumal - Orame Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Vintage styling is easier to enjoy than ever before with the Orame area rug by Jaipur Living. This piece is part of the easy-upkeep Lumal collection, a series of area rugs that combine classic patterns with modern construction techniques for go-anywhere appeal.

  • Lumal collection area rugs are machine washable for effortless upkeep right at home. These rugs are ideal for function-forward placements like dining rooms, entryways, and hallways.
  • Orame features a classic medallion and border pattern filled with southwestern rug motifs. Light neutral coloration makes this rug easy to coordinate with a wide range of decor themes.
  • This piece is power loomed with a 100% polyester rug surface that resists staining and fading. The flat texture allows for easy cleanup while remaining soft and comfortable underfoot.
  • Wash on a gentle cycle using cool water. Lay flat or hang to dry.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Cardamom - Zascha Area Rug
Body (HTML):
If you can't get enough of the fine details that effortlessly elevate your interior design, you'll be thrilled with the Cardamom Zascha Area Rug from the Vibe Collection by Jaipur Living.

  • With its cool blue and warm brown tones, this traditional area rug is easy to incorporate into design schemes of all kinds. The detailed, distressed, Turkish-inspired motif promises endless character and intrigue.
  • With a chic, looped pile, this 100% wool area rug brings depth and dimension to any design scheme. The medium pile area rug is low-maintenance and stain-resistant.
  • This sophisticated area rug is expertly hand-tufted in India by master artisans.
  • To keep your gorgeous rug looking fresh between professional cleanings, spot cleaning with a white cloth is recommended.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Zefira - Bellona Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Blending global, tribal, and traditional elements, the intricate design of our Vibe by Jaipur Living Zefira Bellona area rug brings plenty of visual intrigue to your home. Even better, it's crafted of synthetic fibers for long-lasting comfort underfoot.

  • Soft to the touch yet highly resilient, polypropylene is also beloved for its ease of care and inherent stain-resistance.
  • A sure-fire show-stopper, this traditional beauty, in playful pink and gray tones, adds a classic-made-modern accent to your bedroom, living room, or office.
  • Our traditional indoor rug boasts a high pile height of durable polypropylene, which is power-loomed by artisans.
  • Avoid getting your area rug extremely wet, so its fibers remain strong over the years.

Blending global, tribal, and traditional elements, the intricate design of our Vibe by Jaipur Living Zefira Bellona area rug brings plenty of visual intrigue to your home. Even better, it's crafted of synthetic fibers for long-lasting comfort underfoot.

  • Soft to the touch yet highly resilient, polypropylene is also beloved for its ease of care and inherent stain-resistance.
  • A sure-fire show-stopper, this traditional beauty, in playful pink and gray tones, adds a classic-made-modern accent to your bedroom, living room, or office.
  • Our traditional indoor rug boasts a high pile height of durable polypropylene, which is power-loomed by artisans.
  • Avoid getting your area rug extremely wet, so its fibers remain strong over the years.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Cardamom - Ahava Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Tufted by hand for timeless craftsmanship, our Vibe by Jaipur Living Cardamom Ahava rug provides classic good looks as well thanks to its Turkish-inspired design. Its 100% wool makeup also promises a super soft feel.

  • The Cardamom collection is naturally soft and strong courtesy of its wool construction, which is meticulously hand-tufted by artisans.
  • Boasting classic Turkish motifs in sun-faded jewel tones, our traditional floor covering brings everyday elegance to any space, from your office to your living room and beyond.
  • These indoor rugs are masterfully hand-tufted into a plush pile by artisans for supreme comfort underfoot.
  • To clean your area rug, simply vacuum on top and below when dirty.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Zefira - Kyda Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Timeless medallion motifs in fanciful pink and gray tones grant a classic-yet-approachable look to our Vibe by Jaipur Living Zefira Kyda rug. Plus, this piece is made from durable polypropylene yarns that feel soft underfoot.

  • Thanks to its stain-resistant, easy-care properties, polypropylene makes our Zefira collection perfect for those with kids or pets.
  • An on-trend colorway of pink and gray provides a friendly, energetic attitude to the medallion motifs on this traditional rug, letting it easily pair with global, bohemian, and eclectic accents.
  • A family-friendly rug that's soft and resilient, this piece is power-loomed into a plush pile of synthetic yarns.
  • This area rug should be vacuumed frequently to extend the life of its fibers.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Cardamom - Dahir Area Rug
Body (HTML):
From boho spaces to Southwestern design schemes, the Cardamom Dahir Area Rug from the Vibe Collection by Jaipur Living is sure to stand out.

  • In cream, gray, terracotta, burnished gold, and blue, this unique, traditional area rug adds subtle pops of color to your stylish home. The tribal elements are inspired by Turkish design, giving the rug an undeniably global feel.
  • With a chic, looped pile, this 100% wool area rug brings depth and dimension to any design scheme. The medium pile area rug is low-maintenance and stain-resistant.
  • With endless sophistication and attention to detail, this gorgeous area rug is hand-tufted in India.
  • Spills on your rug may be cleaned with water and mild soap or by hosing it down outside.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Garcia Washables - Lucinda Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The elegant Lucinda area rug offers all the allure of a treasured antique but with all the advantages of modern materials. This unique piece is part of the Garcia collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living, a series that reimagines classic rug patterns for busy modern lifestyles.

  • A synthetic rug surface makes the Lucinda area rug especially well-suited for homes with pets and children. The flat, low-profile construction is especially simple to clean and maintain.
  • Lucinda features an intricate central medallion surrounded by stylized botanicals and angular spandrels. The color palette is awash in dramatic reds and blues with a world of enchanting jewel tones throughout.
  • Garcia collection area rugs are woven with a flat surface, providing a smooth canvas for the high-resolution digital pattern printed atop. The 100% polyester rug surface is backed with a strong cotton-poly blend for strength.
  • Immediately blot away spills using a dry white cloth. When vacuuming, use a suction-only setting with the beater bar component disengaged. Garcia collection rugs can be machine-washed up to four times.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Nambe - Adrar Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a warm and welcoming statement anywhere – indoors or outdoors – with the versatile Nambe collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living. The handsome Adrar area rug mimics the look of natural jute for a beautifully fluid look, but it's made with strong synthetic fibers that can keep up with hardwearing environments.

  • Each area rug in the Nambe collection is resistant against staining, weather, and wear for long-lasting appeal. Feel confident using this rug outdoors or within active indoor spaces.
  • This exciting accent features a chic global nomad pattern with geometric diamond motifs framed by simple linear borders. Earth tones allow for easy coordination with a wide variety of decor themes.
  • Adrar is a 100% polypropylene rug power-loomed with exceptional strength and resilience. The flatwoven surface is easy to clean and the edges are reinforced to prevent fraying.
  • Spot clean using mild soap, then rinse with cool water. This rug can be rinsed outdoors using any standard garden hose. Hang to dry before returning to use.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Vindage Printed - Hepburn Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The Vindage collection melds vintage inspiration with on-trend colorways and durability for lived-in spaces. This digitally printed assortment features deep, rich tones and stunning abrashed designs that lend heirloom style to any home. The Hepburn area rug depicts a distressed medallion pattern with floral detailing in rich tones of rust, beige, green, blue, charcoal, deep red, and orange. The easy-care design withstands pets, children, and high traffic areas of the home such as living rooms, dining areas, kitchens, and bathrooms.

  • Power-Loomed Performance: the digitally printed and machine-made quality offer an innovative vintage style
  • Everyday Luxury: 50% cotton and 50% polyester
  • No Pile: flat finish for low-profile, vintage look
  • Care and Cleaning: Blot stains immediately and clean using a mild soap mixed with equal parts white vinegar and water. Vacuum regularly with beater bar off.
  • Rug Pad Recommended: prevent bunching and slipping with a rubber-backed, non-slip rug pad
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

This digitally printed assortment features deep, rich tones and stunning abrashed designs that lend heirloom style to any home. The Hepburn area rug depicts a distressed medallion pattern with floral detailing in rich tones of rust, beige, green, blue, charcoal, deep red, and orange. The easy-care design withstands pets, children, and high traffic areas of the home such as living rooms, dining areas, kitchens, and bathrooms.

  • Power-Loomed Performance: the digitally printed and machine-made quality offer an innovative vintage style
  • Everyday Luxury: 50% cotton and 50% polyester
  • No Pile: flat finish for low-profile, vintage look
  • Care and Cleaning: Blot stains immediately and clean using a mild soap mixed with equal parts white vinegar and water. Vacuum regularly with beater bar off.
  • Rug Pad Recommended: prevent bunching and slipping with a rubber-backed, non-slip rug pad
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Mahaba - Arpino Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With patterns that echo African basket weaves, the Mahaba collection features a cushioned, looped pile and earthy tones ideal for indoors and out. The Arpino design features a complex geometric pattern in various hues. The bold color palettes anchor spaces with a contemporary feel. Crafted of durable polypropylene, this rug can easily stand up to heavily trafficked areas and outdoor elements.

  • High-Performance Style: this indoor/outdoor rug is specifically designed to tolerate outdoor elements and heavy traffic
  • Weather-Resistant Durability: made of 100% polypropylene to maximize durability in high-traffic and outdoor areas
  • Looped Pile: low, looped pile lends rich texture to the stain-resistant fibers
  • Care and Cleaning: Clean or remove stains by using mild soap. Rinse with clean water or a garden hose. Hang and allow rug to dry before laying rug out. Vacuum regularly with beater bar off for indoor use.
  • Rug Pad Recommended: allow maximum air flow and additional cushioning with an outdoor rug pad
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Kairos - Adalee Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bring a fun, warm vibe to any area of your home with the cute palette and classic good looks of our Jaipur Living Kairos Adalee rug. Even better, this pretty piece is crafted of soft-yet-resilient polyester fibers.

  • The design is printed directly onto the flat polyester surface. No pile ensures durability in a kid- and pet-friendly household.
  • In addition to a comfy feel and hard-wearing quality, polyester grants the Kairos collection incredible affordability.
  • A traditional, slightly distressed diamond medallion pattern in playful pink and blue tones grants timeless appeal to casual or formal settings.
  • This low-profile indoor rug features power-loomed polyester yarns, resulting in comfort and strength.
  • Prolong the life of your area rug by regularly vacuuming it to remove embedded dirt and debris.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Kairos - Chilton Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Evoking vintage designs from centuries past, the Jaipur Living Kairos Chilton rug combines a timeless quality with playful tones and a hard-wearing polyester construction, making it highly versatile.

  • The design is printed directly onto the flat polyester surface. No pile ensures durability in a kid- and pet-friendly household.
  • Low to the ground and incredibly resilient, this easy-care rug is well-suited for families with kids or pets.
  • With a gorgeous, brown border and striking medallion motifs in pink, our traditional floor covering offers a fun, flirty look to your craft room, bedroom, or family room.
  • Machine-loomed for precision, this polyester area rug boasts a low profile and super soft feel.
  • To maintain an even appearance, rotate your rug every few months to prevent the same areas from fading.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Swoon - Lisana Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a bold and beautiful choice for your home with the breathtaking Swoon Lisana Area Rug from the Jaipur Living Vibe Collection.

  • This timeless, yet on-trend indoor/outdoor area rug is machine-made in Turkey.
  • The distressing applied to the pattern replicates a vintage feel, creating a truly unique accent piece.
  • This enchanting, traditional area rug gives off a hint of Oriental charm with its floral pattern in a bold mix of blue, pink, gray, and neutral tones. Romantic and exciting, this fresh rug is sure to make an impactful addition to your favorite space.
  • The plush, 100% polyester area rug offers a low pile and durable construction. Whether you use it indoors or outdoors, it's the ideal way to create a layered look in any child-friendly or pet-friendly home.
  • To remove staining, just use mild soap before rinsing with your garden hose. Hang the rug dry before returning it to its outdoor or indoor location.

Title: Swoon - Lisana Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a bold and beautiful choice for your home with the breathtaking Swoon Lisana Area Rug from the Jaipur Living Vibe Collection.

  • This timeless, yet on-trend indoor/outdoor area rug is machine-made in Turkey.
  • The distressing applied to the pattern replicates a vintage feel, creating a truly unique accent piece.
  • This enchanting, traditional area rug gives off a hint of Oriental charm with its floral pattern in a bold mix of blue, pink, gray, and neutral tones. Romantic and exciting, this fresh rug is sure to make an impactful addition to your favorite space.
  • The plush, 100% polyester area rug offers a low pile and durable construction. Whether you use it indoors or outdoors, it's the ideal way to create a layered look in any child-friendly or pet-friendly home.
  • To remove staining, just use mild soap before rinsing with your garden hose. Hang the rug dry before returning it to its outdoor or indoor location.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Ferris - Orion Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Inspired by the swirling veins of agate stone, the Orion area rug offers a soft and cozy interpretation of nature's artistry. Available as part of the Ferris series from Vibe by Jaipur Living, this practical design offers couture style made with everyday durability in mind.

  • Pastel swirls stretch from edge to edge of this beautiful interior accent – cool blues and greys mingle with subtle hints of warm ivory throughout.
  • Use this contemporary abstract area rug to make a luxurious statement almost anywhere. The plush pile makes this piece ideal for thoughtfully-curated bedrooms, home offices, and relaxing reading corners.
  • Orion enjoys the easy-care advantages of its fully synthetic rug construction. This piece is power loomed from soft polypropylene and polyester, the pile cut to a moderate easy-to-maintain height.
  • Shake smaller size rugs to loosen dirt and dust and vacuum weekly - use a hand-held or upholstery attachment to vacuum shag rugs. Quickly blot away spills with a dry white cloth.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Canteena Printed - Reeves Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Antique charm abounds with the eye-catching Reeves area rug, an exciting addition to the Canteena Printed collection – a series from Vibe by Jaipur Living that combines timeless patterns with smart modern materials that are made to keep up with the most active family environments.

  • Reeves achieves its convincing vintage look using advanced digital printing techniques. The pattern is applied directly to the surface with all of the faux fading and wear built right into the design.
  • Bold earth tones make this traditional rug an especially warm and welcoming addition to any space. Use to complement decor themes like southwestern, lodge, mid-century, and more.
  • Each area rug in the Canteena Printed collection is machine made with a stain-resistant polyester rug surface. Traction backing bolsters the stability of this durable synthetic rug.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they have a chance to set. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.

Title: Swoon - Azura Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a statement in any indoor or outdoor space with the Azura design from the Swoon Collection. This beautiful rug will bring to life an enchanting and truly captivating style, thanks to the whimsical, vibrant color combinations from the Swoon collection.

  • The Azura area rug is inspired by traditional Turkish textiles with an aged and timeless look. It boasts deep hues of pinks and golds.
  • This beautiful rug features a low pile made from a soft blend of polyester and shrink polyester blend for lasting indoor/outdoor durability. An outdoor rug pad is recommended.
  • The Swoon collection works well in high-traffic indoor areas with pets and children or in outdoor seating areas.
  • You can clean this weather-resistant area rug with mild soap and rinse with a hose or clean water. Hang to dry. Vacuum regularly with no beater bar for indoor use.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Bequest - Manor Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a marvelously mod choice for your groovy space with the Bequest Manor Area Rug from the Vibe Collection by Jaipur Living.

  • Bursting with retro influence, this modern area rug is sure to suit just about any design scheme. The tile design and the striking red, yellow, and blue color scheme give this rug all the character and intrigue you demand.
  • This flat pile area rug can be used in any high-traffic area, making it the ideal choice for your busy lifestyle. Designed for indoor or outdoor use, this 100% polypropylene area rug is incredibly practical and versatile.
  • The stylish indoor/outdoor area rug is machine-made in Turkey with durability and quality as top priorities.
  • Hose your rug off outside for quick and simple cleaning, and spot clean with soap and water.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

  • Bursting with retro influence, this modern area rug is sure to suit just about any design scheme. The tile design and the striking red, yellow, and blue color scheme give this rug all the character and intrigue you demand.
  • This flat pile area rug can be used in any high-traffic area, making it the ideal choice for your busy lifestyle. Designed for indoor or outdoor use, this 100% polypropylene area rug is incredibly practical and versatile.
  • The stylish indoor/outdoor area rug is machine-made in Turkey with durability and quality as top priorities.
  • Hose your rug off outside for quick and simple cleaning, and spot clean with soap and water.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Nadine - Taos Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Embrace your dream rug aesthetic anywhere in the home with the ultra-versatile Nadine collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living. The beautiful Taos area rug boasts a charming bohemian chic aesthetic, made with super easy-to-clean materials for a clean and breezy look that will last and last.

  • Nadine collection rugs are resistant against staining, fading, and best of all, each rug is fully machine-washable. Feel confident using in demanding placements like hallways and kitchens.
  • Taos features a chic Moroccan rug pattern consisting of rhythmic linear patterns over a neutral grey base. Use to complement interior themes ranging from cottage chic to Scandinavian hygge to mid-century modern and more.
  • Low polyester rug pile makes Nadine collection designs especially comfortable underfoot despite their impressive resilience. Every edge is tightly serged to prevent fraying even in high-traffic spaces.
  • Care and Cleaning: Blot stains immediately and clean using a mild soap mixed with equal parts white vinegar and water. Vacuum regularly with the beater bar off. Sizes up to 5'X8' can be washed up to four times in traditional 15-20 lb. capacity in-home washing machines. Rugs 6'X9' and larger should be washed in a larger 60+ lb. capacity washing machine found in laundromats, up to four times. Wash on delicate setting with gentle detergent. Lay flat or hang to dry.
  • Rug Pad Recommended: prevent bunching and slipping with a rubber-backed, non-slip rug pad.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Nambe - Sahel Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bring a touch of global flair to any of your favorite spaces with the beautifully patterned Nambe Sahel area rug from Vibe by Jaipur Living. This adaptable accent is adorned with geometric patterns and rhythmic chevon stripes, every detail rendered in satisfying earth tones that mimic the look of natural jute.

  • Sahel is an indoor/outdoor area rug made from water-resistant materials. This rug wards away common sources of staining for true family-friendly appeal wherever you place it.
  • Use this tribal area rug to bring bohemian flair to patios, kitchens, entryways, and other hardwearing placements. This piece features a flat surface for easy handling and effortless cleanup.
  • Nambe collection rugs are power-loomed using 100% polypropylene rug yarns for a fantastic combination of softness and strength. The highly reinforced edges resist fraying.
  • Vacuum using a suction-only setting. Because this rug is waterproof, it can be spot cleaned using mild soap and rinsed thoroughly outdoors using any ordinary garden hose.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Jaida - Kohar Area Rug
Body (HTML):
A fun randomized pattern brings a touch of the unexpected to a classic checker pattern. The whimsical Kohar area rug is part of the Jaida collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living, a series of adaptable contemporary rugs made from practical materials for excellent performance almost anywhere.

  • Jaida collection rugs are resistant against common sources of damage like staining, fading, and wear. They're perfect for active family homes that might experience higher levels of foot traffic.
  • This contemporary rug features a checker pattern that has been stretched and warped for an expressive appearance. Each detail is emphasized with high-low pile construction to achieve a bold dimensional effect.
  • Kohar is a power-loomed design made with a combination of polyester and polypropylene rug yarns. Each end is capped with a thick braided fringe for a touch of boho-chic appeal.
  • Blot spills using a dry white cloth before they have a chance to set. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

  • Kohar is a power-loomed design made with a combination of polyester and polypropylene rug yarns. Each end is capped with a thick braided fringe for a touch of boho-chic appeal.
  • Blot spills using a dry white cloth before they have a chance to set. Vacuum using a suction-only setting.

Title: Cardamom - Sarang Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Inspired by the sun-faded appearance of authentic antique textiles, the beautiful Cardamom Sarang area rug abounds with charm in every detail. This handcrafted accent from Vibe by Jaipur Living is made to provide old-world elegance well-suited to the wear and tear of active modern homes.

  • Cardamom collection rugs are soft enough for quiet retreats like bedrooms and durable enough for high-traffic dining rooms and living spaces. Explore a world of placement possibilities.
  • Sarang features a rich trellis pattern adorned with intricate botanicals, the ends capped with traditional rug borders. The earth-tone colorway is universally flattering for easy placement anywhere.
  • Each rug in the Cardamom collection features hand-tufted construction using a looped pile with dimensional variegated yarns. The 100% wool pile is resilient and comfortable underfoot.
  • Vacuum using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment.

Title: Emrys - Beya Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Add urban nomad-inspired decor to your favorite space with this lovely Beya area rug from the Vibe by Jaipur Living Emrys collection. The Emrys collection is designed for durability and versatility, offering the perfect rugs for today's homes in colors that are easy to decorate with. In addition, the rugs feature Moroccan features and durable, lasting materials.

  • The Beya area rug boasts a blue and white colorway that could fit in with almost any space. In addition, it exhibits a carved geometric and trellis design with intricate detailing.
  • This machine-made area rug has a 0.4" polyester and polypropylene blended pile with carved detailing. It will last longer when kept on a rug pad.
  • You can use the Beya area rug in any area of the home with low to high traffic, pets, children, and busy lifestyles.
  • We recommend keeping your rug in beautiful condition by vacuuming with the beater bar off regularly. Address messes immediately following the instructions on the care tag for the best results.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Canteena Printed - Clanton Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Oversized medallions decorate the Clanton area rug from Vibe by Jaipur Living, its pattern inspired by classic designs reimagined for the modern home. This piece is part of the ultra-practical Canteena Printed collection, a series of family-friendly rugs that can keep up with active interior environments for dependable performance anywhere.

  • Canteena collection rugs stand out through a unique production process, with the patterns printed directly adopt the surface in full color and ultra-high resolution. The result offers all the charm of a handmade rug with all the advantages of smart modern construction.
  • Abrash coloration and subtle asymmetries give this traditional area rug a convincing vintage appearance. Use to complement decor themes like boho chic, global, mid-century, and more.
  • Each rug in the Canteena collection is power-loomed with a 100% polyester rug surface that resists staining and wear. The flat pile cleans up easily for long-lasting appeal.
  • Always remember to disengage the vacuum beater bar component before vacuuming. Address spills immediately by blotting with a dry white cloth or a clean sponge.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Mahaba - Lloria Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With patterns that echo African basket weaves, the Mahaba collection features a cushioned, looped pile and earthy tones ideal for indoors and out. The Lloria design features a confident stripe pattern in various hues. The soothing color palette anchors spaces with a contemporary feel. Crafted of durable polypropylene, this rug can easily stand up to heavily trafficked areas and outdoor elements.

  • High-Performance Style: this indoor/outdoor rug is specifically designed to tolerate outdoor elements and heavy traffic
  • Weather-Resistant Durability: made of 100% polypropylene to maximize durability in high-traffic and outdoor areas
  • Looped Pile: low, looped pile lends rich texture to the stain-resistant fibers
  • Care and Cleaning: Clean or remove stains by using mild soap. Rinse with clean water or a garden hose. Hang and allow rug to dry before laying rug out. Vacuum regularly with beater bar off for indoor use.
  • Rug Pad Recommended: allow maximum air flow and additional cushioning with an outdoor rug pad
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Mazarro - Viviana Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bring playful pastels to any of your favorite spaces with the lively Viviana area rug from Vibe by Jaipur Living! This charming floor covering is part of the go-anywhere Mazarro collection, each rug made from strong synthetic materials that can provide dependable performance both indoors and outdoors.

  • Let this rug showcase its durability in your most active spaces. Place it beneath a dining table, use to bring color to a patio, or use as an easy-cleanup solution for spaces like playrooms and mudrooms.
  • Viviana is a classic striped area rug that features colorful bands that alternate in widths. The colorful palette spans a variety of springtime hues for uplifting appeal within any environment.
  • Mazarro collection area rugs are handwoven for artisanal quality in every detail. These 100% polyester area rugs are highly resistant against weather and wear for long-lasting style.
  • Spot clean as needed using mild soap and cool water. When vacuuming, use a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Canteena Printed - Arkansas Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Rustic details make the Arkansas area rug an especially warm and welcoming addition to any interior. This charming accent is part of the Canteena Printed collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living, a series of practical textiles made to keep up with the most demanding placements throughout the home.

  • Each area rug in the Canteena Printed collection is made from resilient synthetic materials that ward away staining and wear for family-friendly appeal. Children and pets are no match for these durable designs.
  • Use this traditional area rug to complement interior decor themes like southwestern, lodge, farmhouse and more. Distressed coloration lends a warm lived-in look for comfortable appeal.
  • Canteena collection rugs showcase the best of power-loomed construction. The 100% polyester rug face features a flat pile, the pattern printed in high resolution atop. Traction backing bolsters stability.
  • Immediately blot away spills using a dry white cloth. Vacuum in straight lines using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment. Rotate annually.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Terra - Harkin Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Introduce eye-catching style with the subtle and dimensional sheen of this Harkin area rug from the Terra collection. Each rug from the Terra collection features a complementary blend of vibrant and natural tones, creating effortless style and stunning detail.

  • This Harkin area rug comes to life with an elegant medallion motif in a rich colorway. In addition, it features a subtle luster created by the space-dyed polyester pile.
  • This power-loomed rug features a soft, low pile made from 100% polyester with a soft sheen for an authentic vintage look.
  • This durable Harkin area rug is suited for zones with moderate to high traffic. A rug pad is recommended for the most extended life of your purchase.
  • Always vacuum with the beater bar off to protect your rug. Blot all messes immediately using soap and a 1:1 mixture of water and white vinegar.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Nadine - Mateo Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bold, high-impact patterning makes the Nadine Mateo area rug an especially eye-catching focal point sure to transform the ambiance of any room. This piece is part of the high-performance Nadine collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living, a series made to keep up with the most active environments throughout the home.

  • Say goodbye to rug cleaning appointments and say hello to smart machine-washable construction. Refresh your Nadine collection rug just by running it through a standard cycle on your washing machine.
  • Mateo is a stylish Moroccan rug design that features rhythmic geometric patterns in light grey over dark and dramatic charcoal. Wide stripes race down the center while each end is capped in thin layered borders.
  • Each area rug in the Nadine collection is power-loomed with a short 100% polyester rug pile, soft underfoot yet lightweight and easy to handle. Feel confident using in high-traffic spaces and homes with pets or children.
  • Care and Cleaning: Blot stains immediately and clean using a mild soap mixed with equal parts white vinegar and water. Vacuum regularly with the beater bar off. Sizes up to 5'X8' can be washed up to four times in traditional 15-20 lb. capacity in-home washing machines. Rugs 6'X9' and larger should be washed in a larger 60+ lb. capacity washing machine found in laundromats, up to four times. Wash on delicate setting with gentle detergent. Lay flat or hang to dry.
  • Rug Pad Recommended: prevent bunching and slipping with a rubber-backed, non-slip rug pad.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

  • Rug Pad Recommended: prevent bunching and slipping with a rubber-backed, non-slip rug pad.

Title: Nadine - Mateo Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bold, high-impact patterning makes the Nadine Mateo area rug an especially eye-catching focal point sure to transform the ambiance of any room. This piece is part of the high-performance Nadine collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living, a series made to keep up with the most active environments throughout the home.

  • Say goodbye to rug cleaning appointments and say hello to smart machine-washable construction. Refresh your Nadine collection rug just by running it through a standard cycle on your washing machine.
  • Mateo is a stylish Moroccan rug design that features rhythmic geometric patterns in light grey over dark and dramatic charcoal. Wide stripes race down the center while each end is capped in thin layered borders.
  • Each area rug in the Nadine collection is power-loomed with a short 100% polyester rug pile, soft underfoot yet lightweight and easy to handle. Feel confident using in high-traffic spaces and homes with pets or children.
  • Care and Cleaning: Blot stains immediately and clean using a mild soap mixed with equal parts white vinegar and water. Vacuum regularly with the beater bar off. Sizes up to 5'X8' can be washed up to four times in traditional 15-20 lb. capacity in-home washing machines. Rugs 6'X9' and larger should be washed in a larger 60+ lb. capacity washing machine found in laundromats, up to four times. Wash on delicate setting with gentle detergent. Lay flat or hang to dry.
  • Rug Pad Recommended: prevent bunching and slipping with a rubber-backed, non-slip rug pad.

Title: Jolie - Lisette Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Update any modern or traditional space with this elegant Lisette area rug from the Jolie collection by Vibe by Jaipur Living. The Jolie collection features a variety of contemporary hues and motifs ranging from textualized traditional motifs to modern abstracts.

  • The Lisette area rug combines an elegant, global design with a subdued palette of soft gray, gold, and ivory tones.
  • Lisette is power-loomed with a 1/3" synthetic blended pile made from durable polyester and polypropylene.
  • To prevent staining, blot all messes immediately and clean using mild soap and a 1:1 blend of white vinegar and water.
  • We recommend turning off the beater bar when vacuuming to protect your pile. In addition, add a rug pad to your cart to prevent early signs of wear caused by sliding and friction damage.

Title: Terra - Harkin Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Introduce eye-catching style with the subtle and dimensional sheen of this Harkin area rug from the Terra collection. Each rug from the Terra collection features a complementary blend of vibrant and natural tones, creating effortless style and stunning detail.

  • This Harkin area rug comes to life with an elegant medallion motif in a rich colorway. In addition, it features a subtle luster created by the space-dyed polyester pile.
  • This power-loomed rug features a soft, low pile made from 100% polyester with a soft sheen for an authentic vintage look.
  • This durable Harkin area rug is suited for zones with moderate to high traffic. A rug pad is recommended for the most extended life of your purchase.
  • Always vacuum with the beater bar off to protect your rug. Blot all messes immediately using soap and a 1:1 mixture of water and white vinegar.

Title: Mahaba - Maji Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Inspired by the intricate art of African basket weaving, the Mahaba collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living goes bold with well-defined textures and exciting geometric motifs. The handsome Maji area rug is made to go anywhere – an exceptionally durable design with the weather resistance to perform outdoors and the smart contemporary styling to look great inside as well.

  • Maji is weather-resistant, stain-resistant, and suitable for homes with children and pets.
  • Feel confident placing this indoor/outdoor area rug in high traffic placements like beneath dining tables or near entryways. Or use outside to bring your own personal decorative flair to a patio or balcony.
  • Mahaba collection synthetic rugs are made from 100% polypropylene woven into a comfortable looped pile. Each edge is tightly serged for added durability.
  • Spot clean with mild soap and rinse thoroughly with clean water. Hang to dry. When vacuuming, avoid using any type of brush roll or beater bar component.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Zefira - Romano Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Old-world styling gets a smart modern refresh with the Zefira collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living. The beautiful Romano area rug is sure to impress with its whimsical flourishes and intricate palmettes, all rendered in universally-flattering neutrals sure to coordinate easily with a wide variety of decor themes.

  • Classic elegance meets contemporary practicality with this performance-focused rug series. Romano is resistant against common sources of damage like staining and fraying for long-lasting appeal even within family homes.
  • Select from your choice of two neutral colorways. This traditional area rug design features a light distressed effect that lends a vintage look, all without the complicated upkeep or expense. Use this rug in casual and formal placements alike.
  • Zefira collection rugs boast the best of power-loomed construction, ensuring consistency and quality across the series. Plush 100% polypropylene rug pile provides a cozy underfoot experience. Each end is capped in a light fringe.
  • Vacuum using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment. Use a dry white cloth to blot spills immediately upon noticing. Rotate annually.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Nambe - Amanar Area Rug

Tie any space together with the warm and natural appearance of the Amanar area rug, a delightful synthetic rug designed to mimic the look of jute. This piece is part of the global nomad Nambe collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living, a series of chic earthy rugs that can be used indoors and outdoors alike.

  • Easy-upkeep appeal makes Nambe collection rugs especially well-suited for homes with pets and children. This rug is stain-resistant, water-resistant, and highly resilient against wear.

Title: Canteena Printed - Jesse Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The beautiful Jesse area rug is awash in vintage charm, every detail filled with tremendous personality to admire. This piece is part of the Canteena Printed collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living – these rugs mimic the look of authentic antiques, crafted using the latest modern production techniques for impressive strength and value.

  • Strong synthetic materials make Canteena collection rugs perfect for active family environments. These rugs resist staining, fading, and wear for dependable performance even in homes with pets and children.
  • Jesse features a series of traditional rug medallions over an ombre base, the pattern rhythmic and playful. Light borders frame the composition. Use to complement decor themes like southwestern and boho-chic.
  • The 100% polyester rug surface maintains a flat profile for easy cleaning. This rug is power-loomed and printed, then finished with a resilient traction backing for added stability in any setting.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they set. Vacuum using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Ibis Printed - Cosme Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Your contemporary style knows no bounds, and the Ibis Printed Cosme Area Rug from the Vibe Collection by Jaipur Living is proof!

  • Boasting a clean, high-contrast white and gray color scheme, this modern area rug brightens up any space instantly. The sleek, abstract pattern ensures that your artistic side will be on full display, whether you use the rug on your patio or in your carefully-curated living room.
  • This flat pile area rug can be used in any high-traffic area, making it the ideal choice for your busy lifestyle. Designed for indoor or outdoor use, this 100% polyester area rug is incredibly practical and versatile.
  • This effortlessly-chic, modern indoor/outdoor area rug is machine-made in Turkey.
  • Spills on your rug may be cleaned with water and mild soap or by hosing it down outside.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Jaida - Nicia Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The eye-catching Nicia area rug features a playful take on the classic check pattern, each square trimmed with a carved border for bold textural appeal. This piece is part of the Jaida collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living, a series that emphasizes durability for everyday practicality.

  • Each area rug in the Jaida collection is made from smart synthetics that resist staining and fading, perfect for family environments. Feel confident using these rugs in homes with pets and children.
  • High-low topography brings bold dimension to the surface, with the white squares expressed in plush pile to contrast with the lower black yarns. Each end is capped with a thick braided fringe.
  • Nicia is made using advanced power-loomed construction for a fantastic combination of quality and value. The blended synthetic rug pile is made from super-soft polyester and polypropylene.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they set. Vacuum in straight lines using a suction-only setting, taking care to avoid vacuuming over the fringe.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Ibis Printed - Cantania Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a playful and pretty choice for your indoor or outdoor living space with the bold Ibis Printed Cantania Area Rug from the Vibe Collection by Jaipur Living.

  • In bright blues and golds with touches of neutral beige, this modern area rug is colorful, fun, and exciting. An oversized, leafy floral pattern brings a touch of the tropics to your everyday life.
  • This 100% polyester is a perfect addition to your busy lifestyle because it's incomparably versatile and practical. The flat pile area rug is ideal for any high-traffic space - inside the house and out!
  • This chic indoor/outdoor area rug promises quality and durability. It is expertly machine-made in Turkey.
  • Hose your rug off outside for quick and simple cleaning, and spot clean with soap and water.

Title: Vindage Printed - Chaplin Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The Vindage collection melds vintage inspiration with on-trend colorways and durability for lived-in spaces. This digitally printed assortment features deep, rich tones and stunning abrashed designs that lend heirloom style to any home. The Chaplin area rug depicts a distressed medallion pattern with floral detailing in rich tones of green, blue, dark brown, pink, cream, and navy. The easy-care design withstands pets, children, and high traffic areas of the home such as living rooms, dining areas, kitchens, and bathrooms.

  • Power-Loomed Performance: the digitally printed and machine-made quality offer an innovative vintage style
  • Everyday Luxury: 50% cotton and 50% polyester
  • No Pile: flat finish for low-profile, vintage look
  • Care and Cleaning: Blot stains immediately and clean using a mild soap mixed with equal parts white vinegar and water. Vacuum regularly with beater bar off.
  • Rug Pad Recommended: prevent bunching and slipping with a rubber-backed, non-slip rug pad
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Garcia Washables - Sancho Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Reinvigorate any of your favorite interior spaces with the eye-catching Sancho area rug from Vibe by Jaipur Living. This piece is part of the exciting Garcia collection, a series that draws inspiration from antique heirlooms – classic patterns are reimagined in smart modern materials sure to stand up well to everyday wear and tear.

  • Sancho readily resists staining and fading for long-lasting vibrancy. The surface features a smooth texture that cleans up easily, perfect for homes that are shared with pets and children.
  • Vibrant colors make Sancho a true statement piece that will transform any space it graces. This design features traditional rug patterns rendered in red, violet, pink, green, and so many hues in between.
  • Garcia collection rugs are power loomed with a 100% polyester surface and a durable cotton-poly backing. The patterns and colors are digitally printed on the surface in high resolution.
  • Vacuum as needed using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment. Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they have a chance to set. Wash on a gentle laundry cycle up to four times.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Terra - Canna Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Show your space some love with the Canna area rug from the effortlessly stylish Terra Collection. It features a detailed medallion motif that will bring any room to life with a complementary mix of gray, yellow, ivory, blue, orange, and deep plum hues.

  • The Canna area rug features a blend of vibrant and natural tones and space-dyed polyester for a unique colorway and subtle, dimensional sheen.
  • This low-pile area rug is power-loomed with precision using durable polyester yarns for lasting beauty in any interior environment.
  • The Canna rug's soft, low pile is ideal for bringing everyday luxury into medium and high traffic spaces. A rug pad is recommended.
  • Clean your rug with mild soap and a 1:1 blend of water and white vinegar. Vacuum regularly with the beater bar off.

Title: Torren Pillow - Lindy
Body (HTML):
Bring dimension to your seating arrangements with the textural Lindy pillow from the Torren Pillow series from Vibe by Jaipur Living. This attractive design combines geometric elements with global flair, a soft and welcoming addition to any of your favorite spaces.

  • Torren Pillow designs are made from weather-resistant materials for use indoors and outdoors alike.
  • Select from three versatile color options, each one based on cozy earth tones for easy coordination. This contemporary indoor/outdoor pillow is a durable option for reading chairs, sofas, and patio loungers.
  • Lindy is a 100% polyester pillow with an intricately woven face and a solid fabric back panel. The back is outfitted with a hidden zipper to make the plush insert easy to remove.
  • Remove the cover before spot cleaning with mild soap and cool water. Rinse thoroughly and allow to air dry.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Mahaba - Hazina Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With a pattern that echoes African basket weaves, the Hazina area rug from the Mahaba collection promises to upgrade any indoor or outdoor setting. It features a cushioned, looped pile with earthy tones ideal for today's spaces.

  • The Hazina rug design features an eye-catching lattice pattern with geometric details and captivating appeal. The beige, sea green, and taupe hues anchor spaces with a dark, neutral palette.
  • This power-loomed rug features a low, looped pile that's stain-resistant with a rich texture. It is power-loomed from polyester with a soft sheen, creating an authentic vintage look.
  • This indoor/outdoor area rug is specifically designed to withstand heavy traffic and outdoor elements with ease. A rug pad is recommended.
  • Clean your rug using mild soap and clean water. Hang to dry and vacuum regularly with no beater bar for indoor use.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Ferris - Natrix Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The handsome Ferris Natrix area rug is an innovative Jaipur Living accent designed with versatile decorative possibilities in mind. A neutral palette of beige and silver gets a geometric modern treatment, the surface carved with a meandering linear pattern that beckons the eye to follow along.

  • Resilient construction means that Ferris collection rugs can go almost anywhere. Each one is resistant against staining and wear for long-lasting performance even in demanding settings like dining rooms.
  • Natrix is a contemporary area rug with an all-over pattern that stretches from edge to edge, opening the door for flexible placement. The super soft pile features a luminous quality sure to brighten any setting.
  • Ferris collection synthetic rugs are power-loomed from a combination of polyester and polypropylene. The pile is cropped low for easy upkeep, a fantastic investment for busy lifestyles.
  • Quickly blot away spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Always remember to disengage the vacuum beater bar component before vacuuming.

Body (HTML):
The handsome Ferris Natrix area rug is an innovative Jaipur Living accent designed with versatile decorative possibilities in mind. A neutral palette of beige and silver gets a geometric modern treatment, the surface carved with a meandering linear pattern that beckons the eye to follow along.

  • Resilient construction means that Ferris collection rugs can go almost anywhere. Each one is resistant against staining and wear for long-lasting performance even in demanding settings like dining rooms.
  • Natrix is a contemporary area rug with an all-over pattern that stretches from edge to edge, opening the door for flexible placement. The super soft pile features a luminous quality sure to brighten any setting.
  • Ferris collection synthetic rugs are power-loomed from a combination of polyester and polypropylene. The pile is cropped low for easy upkeep, a fantastic investment for busy lifestyles.
  • Quickly blot away spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Always remember to disengage the vacuum beater bar component before vacuuming.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Bahia - Sazon Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Fans of modern styling and classic Moroccan motifs are sure to fall for this Sazon rug from the Vibe by Jaipur Living Bahia collection. Each piece from the Bahia collection boasts updated Moroccan styling and colors with a plush, flokati-style pile.

  • The Sazon rug stands out with an eye-catching bordered design, braided boho-chic fringe detailing, and a modern colorway.
  • This power-loomed rug is designed for lasting durability with a soft flokati-style 0.4" pile and braided fringe.
  • Add a quality rug pad to your cart to prevent unnecessary wear caused by friction damage and sliding, adding years to the life of your rug.
  • For the best results, vacuum regularly with the beater bar switched off and clean all stains immediately using a mild soap.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Continuum - Cardinal Area Rug
Body (HTML):
It's impossible not to be captivated by the unique details of the Continuum Cardinal Area Rug from the Vibe Collection by Jaipur Living.

  • Featuring diamonds, medallions, and stripes in a cream colorway, this modern area rug takes an artistic approach to interior (or exterior!) design.
  • This flat pile area rug is ideal for any high-traffic space - inside the house and out! The 100% polypropylene is a perfect addition to your busy lifestyle because it's incomparably versatile and practical.
  • This charming, stylish indoor/outdoor area rug is machine-made in Turkey.
  • Spills on your rug may be cleaned with water and mild soap or by hosing it down outside.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Jaida - Fantana Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Chic geometric stripes stretch across the surface of the Fantana rug, the lines gently wavering and meandering with expressive flair. This handsome design is part of the Jaida collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living, a series that provides a practical modern take on the ever-popular Moroccan rug aesthetic.

  • Family-friendly construction allows this rug to provide dependable performance anywhere. The plush pile is resistant against staining, shedding, and wear for easy-upkeep appeal even in high-traffic placements.
  • A light ivory and beige colorway allows this rug to effortlessly complement a wide range of interior palettes – use as an effective grounding element within neutral and colorful decor themes alike.
  • Fantana is machine-made from a synthetic rug blend of polypropylene and polyester worked into a distinctive high-low pile that makes every detail pop. Each end is capped with a playful braided fringe.
  • Vacuum in straight lines using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment. Take care to avoid vacuuming over the fringes. Blot spills using a dry white cloth.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Terra - Katalia Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Enjoy a subtle sheen in your favorite space with this beautiful Katalia area rug from the Terra collection. It features a complementary mix of vibrant and natural tones, creating an effortlessly stylish design that comes to life with space-dyed polyester.

  • The vintage-inspired Katalia area rug design features mixed hues that bring the detailed floral vine motif to life.
  • This power-loomed area rug features a soft and low pile that's made to create an authentic vintage charm.
  • The Katalia area rug is suitable for medium and high-traffic zones. A quality rug pad is recommended to add years to the life of your rug.
  • Vacuum without the beater bar regularly and address all stains immediately using mild soap, water, and white vinegar.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Swoon - Julia Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Freshen up your timeless space with the bold Swoon Julia Area Rug from the Jaipur Living Vibe Collection.

  • This whimsical indoor/outdoor area rug is machine-made in Turkey.
  • This captivating, traditional area rug boasts an Oriental-esque floral and diamond design in blue, gray, and neutral hues.
  • The 100% polyester area rug features a low, plush pile. Made for indoor or outdoor use, this durable rug is sure to be the perfect addition to your pet-friendly or kid-friendly home. It's truly as easy to care for as it is beautiful to look at.
  • If you choose to place this gorgeous rug indoors, vacuum it regularly without a beater bar to keep it clean and fresh.

Body (HTML):
Classic elegance is more practical and accessible than ever with the impressively easy-to-maintain Nadine collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living. The beautiful Yucca area rug features sophisticated old-world motifs rendered in the latest modern materials, made strong to perform in your most demanding placements throughout the home.

  • Don't have time for cleaning appointments? The Nadine collection is machine-washable! Enjoy an instant refresh whenever you want, whether you need to erase a little soil or need to prepare for important guests.
  • Yucca features a triple medallion design, its open field tightly filled with intricate shapes throughout. Geometric borders lend a chic bohemian look well-suited to its Moroccan rug inspiration.
  • Each area rug in the Nadine collection is power-loomed with a short 100% polyester rug pile, soft yet resilient and highly resistant against staining and wear. Feel confident using in high-traffic placements.
  • Care and Cleaning: Blot stains immediately and clean using a mild soap mixed with equal parts white vinegar and water. Vacuum regularly with the beater bar off. Sizes up to 5'X8' can be washed up to four times in traditional 15-20 lb. capacity in-home washing machines. Rugs 6'X9' and larger should be washed in a larger 60+ lb. capacity washing machine found in laundromats, up to four times. Wash on delicate setting with gentle detergent. Lay flat or hang to dry.
  • Rug Pad Recommended: prevent bunching and slipping with a rubber-backed, non-slip rug pad.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Zefira - Althea Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The gorgeous Althea area rug features oversized palmette and rosette motifs spangled across the surface, each glance revealing enchanting detail to admire. This piece is part of the Zefira collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living, a series of practical rugs that combine the best of old-world styling with smart modern functionality.

  • Clever synthetic materials allow Zefira collection rugs to resist common sources of staining and wear for approachable family-friendly appeal. Let these rugs showcase their strength even in homes with pets and children.
  • Althea is available in three adaptable colorways, each one building around adaptable neutrals for easy coordination. Each end of this traditional rug is capped in a light and breezy fringe.
  • This 100% polypropylene area rug features a dense yet manageable pile for exquisite comfort underfoot. Power-loomed construction ensures consistency across the collection.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they set. Vacuum using a suction-only setting. Take care to avoid vacuuming over the fringe.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Abrielle - Mariette Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Embrace the sophistication of timeless traditional motifs while enjoying all the advantages of modern functionality – all with the Mariette area rug from Vibe by Jaipur Living. This durable design is part of the Abrielle collection, a series that mimics the look of handcrafted vintage textiles using modern synthetics made to resist everyday wear and tear.

  • Stylized botanical motifs create an engaging all-over pattern that stretches from edge to edge, framed on each side by a thin and tasteful border. Select from two versatile colorways to find a perfect fit for your unique decor style.
  • Mariette is a fantastic rug selection for placements that demand the best of both comfort and durability. The plush cut pile is soft enough for bedrooms and strong enough for high-traffic placements like living rooms and dining rooms.
  • Abrielle collection synthetic rugs are power loomed for excellent consistency and value. The pile is made from 100% polypropylene for inherent resistance against stains, making it a smart selection for homes with pets or children.
  • Spot clean spills with a solution of cool water and white vinegar, using mild soap as needed. Vacuum using a low power, suction-only setting.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

  • Abrielle collection synthetic rugs are power loomed for excellent consistency and value. The pile is made from 100% polypropylene for inherent resistance against stains, making it a smart selection for homes with pets or children.
  • Spot clean spills with a solution of cool water and white vinegar, using mild soap as needed. Vacuum using a low power, suction-only setting.

Title: Torren Pillow - Lindy
Body (HTML):
Bring dimension to your seating arrangements with the textural Lindy pillow from the Torren Pillow series from Vibe by Jaipur Living. This attractive design combines geometric elements with global flair, a soft and welcoming addition to any of your favorite spaces.

  • Torren Pillow designs are made from weather-resistant materials for use indoors and outdoors alike.
  • Select from three versatile color options, each one based on cozy earth tones for easy coordination. This contemporary indoor/outdoor pillow is a durable option for reading chairs, sofas, and patio loungers.
  • Lindy is a 100% polyester pillow with an intricately woven face and a solid fabric back panel. The back is outfitted with a hidden zipper to make the plush insert easy to remove.
  • Remove the cover before spot cleaning with mild soap and cool water. Rinse thoroughly and allow to air dry.

Title: Sinclaire - Ilias Area Rug
Body (HTML):
While our Jaipur Living Sinclaire Ilias rug is a timeless beauty, it's also versatile enough to feature in contemporary spaces courtesy of its neutral palette, comfortable feel, and hints of lustrous, metallic polyester.

  • The poly and metallic synthetic yarns used to craft the Sinclaire collection provide a comfortable surface as well as a gorgeous glow.
  • For vintage appeal, this transitional floor covering features subtle distressing and earthy neutrals, so it delivers understated elegance to any living or dining area.
  • Machine-loomed of soft and luminous synthetic yarns, this high-pile indoor rug is a luxurious accent.
  • Vacuum frequently to remove dirt, debris, and pet hair that become lodge in the fibers over time.

Title: Swoon - Olivine Area Rug
Body (HTML):
A world of intricate detail awaits with the elegant Olivine area rug from Vibe by Jaipur Living. This area rug offers an approachable way to enjoy the incomparable charm of antique textiles, with strong synthetic materials ensuring easy-upkeep appeal that fits with even the busiest schedules.

  • Use this rug indoors or outdoors. Olivine is resistant against weather and wear for dependable performance wherever you place it. Use in dining rooms, on patios, within entryways, and beyond.
  • Patterns inspired by antique Turkish textiles adorn the all-over field of this traditional area rug design. This rug enjoys a warm earth tone palette for versatile coordination possibilities.
  • Swoon collection rugs are power loomed from polypropylene and polyester. The short synthetic rug pile is soft and silky underfoot but stands up well to everyday wear and tear.
  • Keep your rug looking its best by disengaging the vacuum beater bar component before vacuuming. Spot clean using mild soap and cool water.

Title: Leila - Camille Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Delicate botanical patterns climb and waver throughout the field of the Camille area rug, a sophisticated addition to the Leila collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living. This piece features a light aesthetic with subtle tonality, easy to coordinate for endless decorative potential throughout the home.

  • Each area rug in the Leila collection is made to keep up with active interior spaces like living rooms, dining rooms, children's rooms, and more. Stain resistance makes these rugs fantastic for family homes.
  • Striated space-dyed yarns give this traditional area rug a pleasant vintage appearance for a lovingly well-worn appearance. The grey and brown colorway offers an effective grounding element for a wide range of interior palettes.
  • Leila collection rugs are machine woven with a 100% polyester rug pile. The pile is cropped low for easy upkeep and care. Each edge is tightly serged and each end is capped with a short fringe.
  • Blot spills immediately using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. Vacuum in straight lines using a suction-only setting.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Abrielle - Feyre Area Rug
Body (HTML):
If you enjoy floral patterns and traditional designs, we think you'll love the Feyre area rug from the Abrielle collection. This collection boasts a stunning assortment of pastel and neutral hues on traditional designs, each made to emulate handmade vintage textiles.

  • The lovely Feyre rug grounds any room with a floral medallion pattern that's easy to decorate with. The texture-rich striations give it a vintage appeal and soft handfeel.
  • This area rug features a 0.25" polypropylene pile that's power-loomed for performance. A rug pad is recommended for the most extended life of your purchase.
  • Made from durable, power-loomed polypropylene, this rug is ideal for high-traffic spaces like entryways, dining areas, and living rooms.
  • Blot all stains immediately and clean your rug using mild soap and a 1:1 blend of white vinegar and water. Vacuum the rug regularly with the vacuum's beater bar off.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Bavell - Almeda Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The handsome Almeda area rug celebrates the beauty and the diversity of natural wool – each one handmade by skilled artisans who pick from a range of undyed yarns, spangling the surface with tonal variation. This piece is part of the artfully practical Bavell collection by Jaipur Living.

  • Resilient wool makes Almeda a fantastic selection for active family homes. This rug is durable enough for active living spaces while remaining soft enough for your coziest retreats.
  • This simple striped area rug features a simple two-toned palette composed of undyed wools. These neutral tones are easy to coordinate, ensuring timeless styling in any setting.
  • Bavell collection area rugs are manually tufted by skilled artisans using premium hand-carded yarns. The 100% wool surface maintains a tight and low silhouette for practical performance.
  • Vacuum using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Bavell - Norfolk Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Bavell is an area rug collection that celebrates the beauty of undyed wool and all of the natural variation that it holds. The handsome Norfolk area rug is beautifully handcrafted by skilled Jaipur Living weavers using yarns that are hand-carded, hand-selected, and hand-tufted into a work of art that can be displayed almost anywhere.

  • All area rugs in the Bavell collection are made with undyed wool. Natural variation is to be expected, and only adds to the charm that makes each area rug truly one-of-a-kind.
  • Norfolk is a contemporary area rug that features a solid field flanked by simple stripes along each end. Flecks of natural wool hues like brown and grey add dimension and visual texture to the surface.
  • This rug features an undyed 100% wool rug face tufted into a low pile that cleans up easily for versatile family-friendly appeal. A strong fabric panel stabilizes the back. Feel confident using this rug in high-traffic areas.
  • Blot spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. When vacuuming, use a suction-only setting.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: En Blanc - Sovis Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Versatile styling and luxurious textures meet with the handsome En Blanc Sovis area rug from Vibe by Jaipur Living. This sophisticated piece keeps things simple with an understated pattern, its surface beckoning the touch through its ultra-soft composition.

  • Light striations create a hatched pattern that stretches across the surface, rendered in adaptable neutrals for easy coordination with any interior theme.
  • High-low pile construction brings added definition to every detail. This contemporary rug features a luminous sheen, making light and shadow an integral part of its design.
  • Sovis is power-loomed using the latest weaving technology to achieve exquisite consistency and quality. The soft blended rug pile is made with a combination of smart shrink polyester and silky viscose.
  • Viscose rugs perform their best in dry and stable placements. Prevent prolonged contact with moisture by blotting spills with a dry white cloth or a clean dry sponge.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Vanadey - Vesna Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Enjoy the best of both with our Jaipur Living Vanadey Vesna area rug as this floor covering features a traditional, Persian-inspired design for elegance and synthetic construction for durability.

  • Ideally suited for high-traffic spaces, this versatile rug owes its hard-wearing quality to a stain-resistant synthetic construction.
  • With a classic, distressed colorway of blue and light taupe, our classic floor covering offers subdued sophistication and a hint of Persian style to your master suite, laundry room, or entryway.
  • These traditional rugs boast medium piles of easy-to-clean polyester, which is highly durable as well.
  • Shake your rug outside before vacuuming to remove dirt and debris that may have fallen deeper into the weave.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Jaida - Khoda Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Cozy texture and tone make the Khoda area rug an especially inviting addition to any of your favorite interior spaces. As part of the Jaida collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living, this area rug is made with everyday practicality in mind – feel confident exploring a world of different ways to use this adaptable accent.

  • Khoda is a family-friendly area rug made from smart stain-resistant synthetics. Easy upkeep ensures a fresh look that will last, even when placed within demanding spaces like dining rooms.
  • Sweeping striations cross from one side of this Moroccan rug to the other, created by the deep valleys and plush peaks of the high-low pile construction. The beige coloration allows for easy coordination.
  • Jaida collection rugs are made by machine using a hardworking synthetic rug combination of polyester and polypropylene. The edges are tightly serged and the ends are finished in a fringe of thick braids.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they set. Vacuum using a suction-only setting. Be careful to avoid vacuuming over the fringe.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Kysa - Javyn Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Small black dots dance across the surface of the Javyn area rug, all expressed in linear rows that waver and wander for a handmade appearance. This charming design is part of the Kysa collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living, a series made strong for use indoors and outdoors alike.

  • Durable easy-care construction makes this rug a fantastic option for hardwearing indoor placements like dining rooms and sunny outdoor environments like patios. This piece is resistant against staining, moisture, fading, and wear.
  • Each dot that makes up this contemporary rug pattern is made with higher pile than the cream base that surrounds. This lends a dimensional appearance to the surface and makes every detail stand out with textural appeal.
  • Javyn is a 100% polyester area rug made using advanced power-loom technology for consistency and value. The edges are tightly serged to prevent fraying and the pile is cropped low for easier upkeep.
  • Vacuum using a suction-only setting. Spot clean as needed using mild soap and cool water, then rinse with a garden hose and hang to dry.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Nambe - Kidal Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Enjoy the look of a natural jute rug with all the advantages of modern synthetic materials with the effortlessly versatile Nambe Kidal area rug from Vibe by Jaipur Living. This unique design features warm earth tones to serve as an effective grounding element – indoors and outdoors alike.

  • Nambe collection area rugs are made with smart weather-resistant synthetics for dependable resilience and easy-upkeep appeal. These family-friendly rugs are made to perform in your most demanding placements.
  • This contemporary rug features a chic global aesthetic that coordinates well with a wide variety of decor themes, from bohemian chic to farmhouse to mid-century modern and more. Choose from two colorways.
  • Power-loomed construction achieves fantastic resilience and consistency across the Nambe collection. This indoor/outdoor synthetic rug is made from 100% polypropylene for excellent resistance against staining.
  • Spot clean using mild soap. This rug can be rinsed outdoors using a garden hose. Hang to dry.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Myriad - Emeline Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Turkish designs are the inspiration for our Vibe by Jaipur Living Myriad Emeline rug, which features a vintage-meets-abstract look in warm tones. For comfort and practicality, it's crafted of high-pile poly yarns.

  • Highly durable and soft to the touch, this synthetic rug is easy to clean and a family-friendly favorite.
  • Bring contemporary appeal to your entryway, office, or master suite with the abstract design and warm pink and red hues of this beautiful accent piece.
  • Our power-loomed area rug boasts a plush pile of blended polypropylene and polyester for ultra-durability and comfort.
  • Lighter stains or spills can be removed from rug fibers with the help of sponge and cold water.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Myriad - Jolene Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Reminiscent of the swirling bands of color on Jupiter, our Vibe by Jaipur Living Myriad Jolene rug brings an otherworldly contemporary look to any space. Even better, it's made of synthetic fibers for maximum durability.

  • The ideal foundation for high-traffic spaces, our Myriad collection owes its long-lasting comfort and durability to a poly construction.
  • Enjoy a fanciful, ethereal air in any casual or formal space with the whirling pink and red tones and abstract design of this contemporary floor covering.
  • A high pile of power-loomed poly yarns gives our stylish indoor rug a soft feel and exceptional resilience.
  • Remove spills or stains on rug yarns by using a sponge, cold water, and mild detergent.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Melo - Roane Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Are you a fan of glamourous chic style? If so, we think you'll fall in love with this eye-catching Roane area rug from Vibe by Jaipur Living's Melo collection. The Melo collection showcases subdued colorways and versatile, traditional-inspired motifs designed to add life to today's spaces.

  • The Roane area rug features a detailed trellis motif with a lovely gray, green, blue, gold, and ivory colorway.
  • The Roane rug has a 0.33" power-loomed polyester pile designed with a lustrous sheen and a varied pile height to add dimension and depth.
  • This rug is suitable for homes with pets and children in medium to high traffic areas like the living room, home office, and bedroom.
  • Follow all instructions on the care tag for the best results and always vacuum with the beater bar turned off.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger
