Title: Jaida - Dawson Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Vibe by Jaipur Living offers a chic contemporary take on the Moroccan rug trend with the beautifully refined Jaida collection. The charming Dawson rug features a geometric lattice pattern rendered in soft shades of ivory and beige, with each end capped in a braided fringe for a playful eye-catching finish.

  • Jaida collection rugs are highly resistant against staining and shedding for true family-friendly functionality. These rugs are made to perform even in high-traffic placements.
  • Use this Moroccan rug to complement decor themes like mid-century modern, Scandinavian hygge, bohemian chic, and more. This piece is a natural fit for contemporary and rustic themes alike.
  • High-low pile construction makes every detail pop. Jaida collection synthetic rugs are machine-made from polypropylene and polyester, the plush pile providing supportive comfort underfoot.
  • Immediately blot away spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. When vacuuming, make sure the vacuum beater bar component is disengaged.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

The charming Dawson rug features a geometric lattice pattern rendered in soft shades of ivory and beige, with each end capped in a braided fringe for a playful eye-catching finish.

  • Jaida collection rugs are highly resistant against staining and shedding for true family-friendly functionality. These rugs are made to perform even in high-traffic placements.
  • Use this Moroccan rug to complement decor themes like mid-century modern, Scandinavian hygge, bohemian chic, and more. This piece is a natural fit for contemporary and rustic themes alike.
  • High-low pile construction makes every detail pop. Jaida collection synthetic rugs are machine-made from polypropylene and polyester, the plush pile providing supportive comfort underfoot.
  • Immediately blot away spills using a dry white cloth or a clean sponge. When vacuuming, make sure the vacuum beater bar component is disengaged.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Ferris - Gowon Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Distressed textures bring a bold modern edge to the Gowan area rug, an eye-catching addition to the Ferris collection from Jaipur Living. This piece offers versatile go-anywhere appeal, its durable construction well-suited for a wide variety of decorative settings throughout the home.

  • Ferris is a family-friendly area rug collection made from strong synthetics that readily resist staining, fading, and wear. Feel confident using these rugs in your hardest-wearing placements like dining rooms and living rooms.
  • Gowon is a contemporary rug with a minimalist easy-to-coordinate palette consisting of grey, white, and charcoal. High-low pile construction brings added definition to every detail while lustrous yarns lend a luxurious sheen.
  • Every rug in the Ferris collection is power-loomed from a smart synthetic fiber blend consisting of polypropylene and polyester rug yarns. The edges are serged and the ends are finished with a fold.
  • Use a dry white cloth to blot spills before they set. When vacuuming, use a suction-only setting with the beater bar component disengaged.

Title: Pampas Pillow - Papyrus
Body (HTML):
If you're looking for Bohemian-style pillows to update your indoor or outdoor space, we think you'll love the Papyrus lumbar pillow from the Pampas collection. Modern lines and global inspiration define the textural Pampas pillow collection, creating eye-catching aesthetic appeal.

  • The Papyrus lumbar pillow boasts bands of tribal embroidery and versatile colorways, perfect for adding boho charm to a contemporary home.
  • The Papyrus lumbar pillow is made from durable polyester to offer lasting comfort in any environment. This pillow is at home in a bedroom or on a patio.
  • The Papyrus lumbar pillow is versatile and easy to care for, thanks to the zipper closure and durable fabric. In addition, it features a solid-colored backing.
  • Clean all stains promptly using gentle soap or detergent for the best results. Always rinse with clean water and air dry.

Title: Abrielle - Devlin Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Show your home some love with this Devlin rug from the Abrielle collection. This texture-rich area rug is ideal for any high-traffic zone in your home with a nature-inspired abstract motif and beautiful colorway.

  • The Abrielle collection features modern colorways of pastel and neutral hues with a stunning assortment of traditional designs. This Devlin rug design can ground any room with its texture-rich striations and handmade appeal.
  • This area rug features a 0.25" power-loomed pile designed to emulate handmade craftmanship and vintage textiles. It is made with durable polypropylene fibers.
  • The Devlin rug is perfect for entryways, dining areas, living rooms, and other high-traffic spaces. A rug pad is recommended.
  • Vacuum your rug often with the beater bar switched off and use mild soap mixed with a 1:1 blend of water and white vintage to blot stains.

Title: Audun - Tarian Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Rich with contemporary charm and elegantly abrashed, the Tarian rug from the Audun collection is the perfect way to add a touch of global flair to your space. This collection boasts an eye-catching assortment of enchanting styles that come alive with subtle pops of color.

  • The Tarian area rug has an elegant Moroccan tile motif with a decorative fringe and a textured pile for added depth and dimension. It stars a neutral palette of gray and cream with hints of blue, magenta, and gold mixed in.
  • Power-looked from polyester, this rug features a high-low pile with a carved-like texture to bring the design to life.
  • This rug is ideal for high-traffic zones, offering pet and kid-friendly durability with an easy-clean surface. A rug pad is recommended.
  • Blot all messes immediately and vacuum regularly with the beater bar off—clean using a mild soap and a 1:1 blend of white vinegar and water.

Title: Emrys - Annistyn Area Rug
Body (HTML):
We think you fall for this beautiful Annistyn area rug from the Vibe by Jaipur Living Emrys collection if you adore Moroccan aesthetics. This simple yet classic collection is easy to decorate with in a range of today's homes and decor styles, and it's made to stand up to lived-in spaces.

  • The Annistyn area rug boasts a charming trellis design with a light taupe, cream, and black colorway to highlight the lovely high-low pile texture.
  • This machine-made area rug has a high-low pile that's made from a polypropylene and polyester blend. It features a 0.4" pile that feels soft underfoot.
  • The Annistyn area rug is suited for homes with pets and children, and it can stand up to any high, medium, or low-traffic spot in your home.
  • To keep your rug in excellent condition, vacuum with the beater bar switched off and spot clean any stains immediately.

Title: Ferris - Sobia Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Set an artistic, breathtaking scene with help from the Ferris Sobia Area Rug by Jaipur Living.

  • Reminiscent of a sunset, this charming, modern area rug incorporates shades of tan, blue, gray, cream, and rust.
  • The abstract pattern and contemporary appeal make this rug the perfect pop of color you've been searching for.
  • With its soft feel and eye-catching texture, this carved, plush, high-low pile rug is a brilliant addition to your home.
  • Vacuum regularly, without the use of the beater bar. Stains should be blotted right away, and professional cleaning is suggested to keep your rug as fresh and flawless as new. A non-slip rug pad is also recommended to keep your rug in place.
  • The charming Ferris Sobia rug is machine-made in Turkey.

Title: Tahiti - Iti Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Invest in true versatility you can use almost anywhere with the Tahiti collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living. The performance-driven Tahiti Iti area rug features a look inspired by sisal but with the everyday practicality of modern synthetics – made to resist your most demanding applications.

  • Tahiti collection rugs readily resist staining, weather, and wear for durability you can depend on within the home and outdoors.
  • Use this contemporary rug in hardwearing indoor placements like beneath the dining table or within a high-traffic entry foyer. Or use as a sophisticated grounding element outdoors to tie together your favorite patio seating arrangement. This design can go anywhere.
  • Skilled artisans craft every Tahiti collection area rug by hand. This piece is made from 100% polypropylene, a synthetic rug material that provides excellent durability while remaining lightweight and simple to maintain.
  • Use cool water and mild soap to spot clean as needed. Rinse thoroughly and hang to dry before returning to use.

Title: Continuum - Axiom Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Anchoring your indoor or outdoor living space is easy with the versatile Continuum Axiom Area Rug from the Vibe Collection by Jaipur Living.

  • With its neutral cream hue, this modern area rug is easy to incorporate into any design scheme. Subtle dimension and texture are offered by an abstract design, giving your entire space a refined and elevated look.
  • Designed for indoor or outdoor use, this 100% polypropylene area rug is incredibly practical and versatile. The flat pile area rug can be used in any high-traffic area, making it the ideal choice for your busy lifestyle.
  • This chic indoor/outdoor area rug is machine-made in Turkey.
  • Hose your rug off outside for quick and simple cleaning, and spot clean with soap and water.

Title: Audun - Jonet Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Show your favorite busy room some affection with this lovely Jonet area rug from the Audun collection. Rich with contemporary charm and elegantly abrashed, the Audun collection features rugs with enchanting styles and subtle pops of color.

  • The Jonet area rug design uses gray colorways, multicolor accents, and a subdued abstract pattern. The textured polyester pile features a carved look and feel to create depth and dimension, and the coordinating fringe adds a vintage appeal.
  • Power-loomed for performance, this beautiful Jonet area rug features a high-low pile and machine-made durability.
  • This rug is ideal for homes with kids and pets, and it can stand up to high-traffic areas with ease. A quality rug pad is recommended.
  • Vacuum with no beater bar as often as needed and blot all stains immediately using a mild soap.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Liri Pillow - Iker
Body (HTML):
Express your adventurous style anywhere you like to spend your time with the Liri Pillow collection – an adaptable series from Vibe by Jaipur Living made for decorating indoors and outdoors alike. The casual Iker lumbar pillow makes it easy to add a dash of globally-inspired styling to any space.

  • Playful geometric patterns are woven across the face of this accent pillow, with zig-zag lines flanked by nested diamonds. This bohemian pillow is finished with a long playful fringe on each side.
  • Get creative with your placement possibilities. Use this pillow to add laidback charm to a patio, sunroom, or poolside lounge, or use as a comfortable accent anywhere within the home.
  • Iker is a handmade pillow crafted from soft polyester yarns. The front is embellished with a textural weave, the back finished with a solid zippered panel in a warm neutral beige.
  • Spot clean only. Use a gentle soap and cool water, then rinse thoroughly and allow to air dry.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Liri Pillow - Haskell Lumbar
Body (HTML):
Make your outdoor areas feel just as warm, comfortable, and personalized as your interior spaces with the Liri Pillow collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living. The gorgeous Haskell Lumbar accent pillow features bold boho styling with tremendous coordination possibilities, sure to make any patio or balcony feel like home.

  • Weather-resistant construction makes the Liri Pillow collection perfect for outdoor placements and hardwearing indoor spaces. Get creative with the arrangement possibilities that await.
  • Haskell features a tiled Moroccan pillow pattern rendered with soft tonal hues, with each end capped in a long fringe for exquisite texture. Choose from a variety of soft earthy colorways.
  • Each item in the Liri Pillow collection is woven with a 100% polyester pillow cover that features playful patterns on the front, while the back is finished with a solid panel and a convenient access zipper.
  • Gently spot clean the cover using mild soap and cool water. Rinse thoroughly and allow to air dry before returning to use.

Title: Jaida - Treble Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Jaida is an area rug collection that takes a modern approach to classic Moroccan motifs. The eye-catching Treble area rug from Vibe by Jaipur Living boasts bold contrast sure to capture attention, all rendered in practical modern synthetics for dependable durability even within high-traffic areas.

  • Treble is made with stain-resistant fibers sure to maintain a bright and clean aesthetic. Each rug in the Jaida collection is perfectly family-friendly and ready to soften your most demanding placements.
  • Use this modern Moroccan area rug to complement interior decor themes like Scandinavian hygge, mid-century modern, postmodern, and more. A world of decorative possibility awaits.
  • Each rug in the Jaida collection is machine-woven using a combination of polyester and polypropylene. The synthetic rug pile maintains a soft medium height for enduring comfort.
  • Always remember to disengage the vacuum beater bar component before vacuuming. Avoid vacuuming over the fringes that cap each end. Blot spills using a dry white cloth.

Title: Mazarro - Sergio Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Summer style awaits with the bright and breezy Sergio area rug, a Vibe by Jaipur Living design that makes it easy to add a lively splash of color to any of your favorite spaces. This piece is part of the indoor/outdoor Mazarro collection, a series of high-performance area rugs made to keep up with your most demanding spaces.

  • Mazarro is resistant against weather and wear for excellent durability on patios, at the poolside, or on sunny balconies. The flatwoven construction makes this series easy to clean, great for dining rooms and homes with pets and children.
  • Sergio is a contemporary striped area rug available in two compelling blue-based colorways. This rug is adorned with vertical bands of color with varied widths, each composition filled with energy.
  • This 100% polyester area rug is flatwoven by the hands of skilled artisans with expert precision in every detail. Each rug is resistant against staining and wear for a bright look that is sure to last.
  • Gently spot clean using mild soap and cool water as needed.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

This piece is part of the indoor/outdoor Mazarro collection, a series of high-performance area rugs made to keep up with your most demanding spaces.

  • Mazarro is resistant against weather and wear for excellent durability on patios, at the poolside, or on sunny balconies. The flatwoven construction makes this series easy to clean, great for dining rooms and homes with pets and children.
  • Sergio is a contemporary striped area rug available in two compelling blue-based colorways. This rug is adorned with vertical bands of color with varied widths, each composition filled with energy.
  • This 100% polyester area rug is flatwoven by the hands of skilled artisans with expert precision in every detail. Each rug is resistant against staining and wear for a bright look that is sure to last.
  • Gently spot clean using mild soap and cool water as needed.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Parable Pillow - Imena
Body (HTML):
Charming fringes, rich patterns, and tonal coloration make the Imena pillow a welcoming addition to any of your favorite seating spaces throughout the home. This piece is part of the Parable Pillow collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living – a series that combines southwestern flair with chic contemporary appeal.

  • Select from two versatile colorways, each one charming and easy to coordinate. Invest in a set or mix and match.
  • Imena features a nested diamond trellis at the center that is framed with plush looped rows. Short fringes add even more texture to the surface.
  • The front of this soft 100% cotton cover is woven with thick yarns, the back made from a solid fabric panel.
  • A hidden zipper is located on the back. Remove the cover to spot clean as needed.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available
Shape (product.metafields.custom.shape): Also in shapes other than rectangle

Title: Ferris - Yushan Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Add some unexpected floor art to your contemporary space with the abstract Ferris Yushan Area Rug by Jaipur Living.

  • With its artistic, unique appeal, this modern area rug is a commanding choice for your stylish home.
  • This polyester and polypropylene area rug is soft, lustrous, and easy to care for.
  • The carved, plush, high-low pile rug gives your space all the texture and dimension it has been lacking.
  • New wool rugs are expected to shed. Vacuuming on a regular basis with the beater bar off will minimize shedding over time.
  • This high-quality area rug is machine-made in Turkey.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Ferris - Gatlin Area Rug
Body (HTML):
With its swirling, marble-inspired look, the Vibe by Jaipur Living Ferris Gatlin area rug provides timeless beauty in a fresh, modern way. Plus, it's crafted of durable synthetic yarns for long-lasting comfort underfoot.

  • Simple to maintain, resistant to stains, and highly resilient, this poly floor covering is a great option for those with kids or pets.
  • Laid-back neutral tones lend impressive versatility to the contemporary, marble-like design on this piece, which is ideally suited for entryways, offices, and living rooms.
  • This power-loomed rug boasts a high pile height of blend polypropylene and polyester, resulting in substantial comfort and durability.
  • Shake smaller size rugs to loosen dirt and dust and routinely vacuum to remove - use a hand-held or upholstery attachment to vacuum shag rugs.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Jaida - Sachi Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The handsome Sachi area rug offers a textural take on trendy Moroccan rug patterns with deep valleys carved into the surface, emphasizing the soft pile for touchable appeal. This piece is part of the Jaida collection – a Vibe by Jaipur Living series made to keep up with the most active environments throughout your home.

  • Synthetic rug fibers allow the Sachi rug to maintain its light and breezy aesthetic even within high-traffic rooms and bustling family homes. This rug is stain-resistant, fade-resistant, and free from shedding.
  • Easy-to-coordinate greys and ivories allow this rug to coordinate easily within a wide variety of palettes. This rug features a solid base of sweeping striations while a loose Moroccan rug trellis plays over top.
  • Machine-made construction ensures excellent consistency across the Jaida collection. These synthetic rugs are made with a blend of polypropylene and polyester. The ends are finished with a bold braided fringe.
  • Quickly blot away spills using a dry white cloth. Vacuum in straight lines using a suction-only setting or hard surface attachment. Rotate annually.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Jaida - Cree Area Rug
Body (HTML):
The eye-catching Cree area rug features large-scale patterns that trace meandering valleys across the surface, rendered in warm neutral tones for a laidback look. This piece is part of the Jaida collection from Vibe by Jaipur Living – each rug is made from smart synthetic materials for versatile functionality wherever you enjoy spending your time.

  • Common sources of staining and wear are no match for this resilient family-friendly area rug. Easy cleanup ensures a fresh, inviting look to underscore your most important moments.
  • Every detail of the Cree area rug is emphasized by dimensional high-low pile construction, the Moroccan rug patterns appearing as if they were carved into the surface. Each end is capped with a braided fringe.
  • This blended synthetic area rug is made with a combination of polypropylene and polyester, materials that resist staining and shedding for easy-upkeep appeal. Feel confident using this rug in high-traffic placements.
  • Quickly blot away spills using a dry white cloth. Vacuum in straight lines using a suction-only setting, taking care to avoid vacuuming over the fringes.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Not available

Title: Kysa - Odion Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Make a chic high-contrast statement with the eye-catching Odion area rug from Vibe by Jaipur Living. This piece is part of the Kysa collection, a series of attractive modern designs that can be used inside and outside of the home – the possibilities are endless with this adaptable series.

  • Odion is resistant against staining, fading, weather, and wear for excellent performance wherever you place it. Use in demanding indoor spaces like dining rooms or comfortable outdoor placements like patios.
  • The meandering linear pattern offers a minimalistic take on classic Turkish carpets, refined and simplified for an edgy aesthetic. This contemporary rug is available in two neutral colorways.
  • Power-loomed construction brings dependable strength to every Kysa collection design. This 100% polyester area rug features a low base, with the linear pattern rendered in plush pile for dimensional appeal.
  • Kysa collection rugs can be spot cleaned using mild soap and cool water. Rinse with a garden hose and hang to dry.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger

Title: Abrielle - Devlin Area Rug
Body (HTML):
Show your home some love with this Devlin rug from the Abrielle collection. This texture-rich area rug is ideal for any high-traffic zone in your home with a nature-inspired abstract motif and beautiful colorway.

  • The Abrielle collection features modern colorways of pastel and neutral hues with a stunning assortment of traditional designs. This Devlin rug design can ground any room with its texture-rich striations and handmade appeal.
  • This area rug features a 0.25" power-loomed pile designed to emulate handmade craftmanship and vintage textiles. It is made with durable polypropylene fibers.
  • The Devlin rug is perfect for entryways, dining areas, living rooms, and other high-traffic spaces. A rug pad is recommended.
  • Vacuum your rug often with the beater bar switched off and use mild soap mixed with a 1:1 blend of water and white vintage to blot stains.
Sample Size (product.metafields.custom.s: Yes. Use that credit towards a 5x8 area rug and larger
